VARDESC: Have you ever been given a vaccine for COVID-19 or enrolled in the COVID-19 clinical vaccine trials?
How many doses of the COVID-19 vaccine have you received to date?
Please specify the other number of doses of the COVID-19 vaccine you have received to date
COMMENT1: ASK IF \How many doses of the COVID-19 vaccine have you received to date?\" = \"4\""

VARDESC: Which COVID-19 vaccine trial or vaccine were you given as your first dose?
Please specify other COVID-19 vaccine you were given as your first dose
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Which COVID-19 vaccine trial or vaccine were you given as your first dose?\" = \"6\""

VARDESC: If you participated in the COVID-19 clinical vaccine trials, do you know if you received a placebo or the vaccine? A placebo is a harmless substance that looks like the vaccine being tested, but does not contain active ingredients.
column19: 3 = I was not part of the COVID-19 clinical vaccine trials

VARDESC: In which month did you receive the first dose of the COVID-19 vaccine? *must provide value
On which day did you receive the first dose of the COVID-19 vaccine? *must provide value
In which year did you receive the first dose of the COVID-19 vaccine? *must provide value
Which COVID-19 vaccine trial or vaccine were you given as your second dose?
Please specify other COVID-19 vaccine you were given as your second dose
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Which COVID-19 vaccine trial or vaccine were you given as your second dose?\" = \"6\""

VARDESC: In which month did you receive or will you receive the second dose of the COVID-19 vaccine? *must provide value
On which day did you receive or will you receive the second dose of the COVID-19 vaccine? *must provide value
In which year did you receive or will you receive the second dose of the COVID-19 vaccine? *must provide value
Which COVID-19 vaccine trial or vaccine were you given as your third dose?
Please specify other COVID-19 vaccine you were given as your third dose
COMMENT1: ASK IF \Which COVID-19 vaccine trial or vaccine were you given as your third dose?\" = \"6\""

VARDESC: In which month did you receive or will you receive the third dose of the COVID-19 vaccine? *must provide value
On which day did you receive or will you receive the third dose of the COVID-19 vaccine? *must provide value
In which year did you receive or will you receive the third dose of the COVID-19 vaccine? *must provide value
